BP.term: negative regulation of neuron apoptotic process

negative regulation of extrinsic apoptotic signaling pathway in absence of ligand

name: unc-5 netrin receptor B
other_names: p53-regulated receptor for death and life protein 1

reactome.name: Caspase activation via Dependence Receptors in the absence of ligand
Caspase activation via extrinsic apoptotic signalling pathway

summary: This gene encodes a member of the netrin family of receptors. This particular protein mediates the repulsive effect of netrin-1 and is a vascular netrin receptor. This encoded protein is also in a group of proteins called dependence receptors (DpRs) which are involved in pro- and anti-apoptotic processes. Many DpRs are involved in embryogenesis and in cancer progression. Two alternatively spliced transcript variants have been described for this gene. [provided by RefSeq, Oct 2011].
